about.title: About the Haramain Volunteers Platform
about.content: This platform aims to organize and facilitate the volunteering process at the Grand Mosque and the Prophet's Mosque, allowing valued volunteers the opportunity to contribute to serving pilgrims and visitors, enhancing their spiritual experience. We strive to provide an interactive and organized environment that efficiently connects volunteers with available opportunities.
